channel.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
channel.description:
Well if you've read the FAQ (if you haven't you'd better do it [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=24[/url]) its say that the BM team will not be working on remakes the gearbox expansions partially because other teams will be. Well this got me looking for them and these are the ones i found.
[url]https://obmsource.com/index3.html[/url] ^a remake of opposing force
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/guardduty[/url] dead ^ A blue shift remake
[url]https://opposingforce2.com/[/url] dead ^ a sequel to opposing force, little bit of fan fiction about the 7 hour war
This thread is basically to save some people the work of have to find these mods and to talk about them. If you've found any other mods like this please post them :slight_smile:

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Level:

There is no affiliation between operation black mesa and this black mesa mod, so whatever that mod team decides to do is up to them, and you’re better off asking in their forum, not this one.

K. I understand they aren’t affiliated, I was simply posting what I think might help their mod out a little. I think I might go and register on their forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
JamesKane:

Provenance is a great mod even though its length was short due to only containing two map.

The creator got hired at Gearbox if I’m not mistaken, not as cool as VALVe, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
garthbartin:

Will Operation Blackmesa try to make their game similar to Blackmesa when it is released? If Blackmesa comes out with one concept of Xen and Operation Blackmesa comes out with their own very different concept it might not look very good.

A bit of constructive criticism is the Radioactive goo in Operation Blackmesa. The goo looks far to similar to Half-life 2’s goo and it looks very different from the goo in blackmesa’s screenshots.

https://www.mobygames.com/images/i/04/41/110891.jpeg
https://blackmesasource.com/media/c2a4_release11_004.jpg
https://www.obmsource.com/media/maps/wtbm/pic5.jpg
I think it would help both mods a lot if they had a similar atmosphere and very similar texturing so that players will feel like they are in the same place as in BM, just in a different part of the facility.

On a lighter note, both dev teams are doing a great job, keep it up!

There is no affiliation between operation black mesa and this black mesa mod, so whatever that mod team decides to do is up to them, and you’re better off asking in their forum, not this one.

Read full topic

And btw, Am I right, if I tell that Opposing Force will celebrate 10 years anniversary soon ?

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
MR.sugar:

Not possible. I’m not a coder, but I think if we want to move Operation Black Mesa on Black Mesa, we will need source code to implement other features Opposing force has into Source engine. I think it’s not possible without BMS’s source code, right?

I see it like this: either you reuse something Black Mesa already offers or you rewrite it from scratch. You would basically overwrite the things you need to adjust for your own mod and stream in the base content you don’t need to apply changes to.

Of course my knowledge of Source modding is limited so it might be much more troublesome than that.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: MR.sugar
item.description:
popsUlfr:

Not if you make Black Mesa a requirement to play your mod. You only supply your own maps, scripts, new textures, sounds, etc… as addon to the main Mod.

If BM gets a Steam release someday, modders may only need to mount the content and use it as a starting point I guess.

Not possible. I’m not a coder, but I think if we want to move Operation Black Mesa on Black Mesa, we will need source code to implement other features Opposing force has into Source engine. I think it’s not possible without BMS’s source code, right?

So no, Operation Black Mesa, or Guard Duty won’t be running under Black Mesa mod, both mods are going to be standalone mods.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
I don’t think that the developers will be releasing all of what you said. It can be easily done without their permission, but then it is blatant stealing.

I live in hope that the developers will give some support to respectable mod’s.

Read full topic

Not if you make Black Mesa a requirement to play your mod. You only supply your own maps, scripts, new textures, sounds, etc… as addon to the main Mod.

If BM gets a Steam release someday, modders may only need to mount the content and use it as a starting point I guess.

Vanzetti:

What I meant is, people will have all the NPCs, models, weapons and textures from Black Mesa, so doing things like BS and OP4 will be much easier.

Well we can’t exactly use any of that.

Since then it really would be stealing.

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: skyms2663
item.description:
Mangled*:

If they do, we’ll all boycott them… and everyone at moddb will rape them.

I think using Black Mesa as a source of inspiration is a much better way to describe what will happen once it’s released.

Considering I myself am a level designer for Operation Black Mesa, I constantly refer back to the architecture that Black Mesa has used.

A lot of the media shots they have released are really well done, and it keeps continuity between the different remakes.

Think of it as what Gearbox did with Half-Life 1, they didn’t 100% remake each section the way they thought it should look, the areas are consistent with that of Half-Life 1.

Another thing I’m certain of is once Black Mesa is released, if either mod tried to design a certain area different to what it’s like in Black Mesa, I’m sure we’d get a fair amount more of “Doesn’t look good, Black Mesa did it better”, than of “U stoel dis fom blac meas.1!11”.

:’( It’s upsetting trying to do something well when you live in the shadow of something else.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: MR.sugar
item.description:
Repzik:

It’s nice to know that whenever a project has died Mr. Sugar is there to tell us it has been resurrected… again… and again…

Well, tell me just one project I resurrected . There is no even single project like that. All of the projects are made from scratch. Even the Guard Duty, which is not using any content from Barney’s tales… So, even the Guard Duty is not resurrection…

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: skyms2663
item.description:
Ohh he already went there.

But what he said is true, Not in the sense that you know Black Mesa is a horrible mod which will be extremely horrible( ). But in the sense that look at other mods like Minerva, now that’s an extremely creative and original piece of work.

Black Mesa will, is and probably always will be an awesome total conversion mod, but I wouldn’t go as far to say it’s the best of the best.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: thezulu
item.description:
MR.sugar:

Also, the fact is, there are some mods that are actually good looking (some of them look much better than Black Mesa + they are more original), it´s a fact.

I wouldn’t go there…

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Similar to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: MR.sugar
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

i am pretty sure this mod will be good i am was just say that its not a certain fact. You also don’t know how these mods will turn out, its also not very fair to compare these mods based on quality because the other ones haven’t been in development as long.

Agree with you. Also, I just don´t understand, how they can judge the Guard Duty, if they haven´t seen ANYTHING from it (except the few of small images and a concept art) and they already know that it can´t be good or better than Black Mesa.

Also, the fact is, there are some mods that are actually good looking (some of them look much better than Black Mesa + they are more original), it´s a fact.

And definitely agree with you on the last sentence.

Read full topic
